name: VR Flight Simulator Pro
description:
Enjoy one the best Virtual Reality experiences currently available for mobile devices!

• Feel what it's like flying inside the cockpit of a real aircraft, by simply using your smartphone.
• Interact with cockpit buttons, switches and levers.
• Push-back, taxi to runway, take-off, fly, land.


IMPORTANT NOTE:
This app is compatible with all VR headsets suitable for mobile devices (such as cardboard or others). You may have to scan the appropriate QR code that provides the best vision quality and adjustments for your headset. (Tap on the gear icon)


Main Features:
--------------
• 2 aircraft types : A320 and B737
• Day/Night
• Cockpit and wing-view cameras
• Realistic physics/aerodynamics
• Ground controls (steering, brakes, pushback)
• Flight controls (roll and pitch)


Cockpit interactions:
--------------------
• Start/shut down engines
• Control thrust amount
• Flaps
• Pushback
• Landing gear


Graphics :
----------
• High definition 3D cockpits
• Realistic airport environment (buildings, taxiways, parking area with jetways, runways)
• Realistic terrain
• Realistic airport runway and taxiway lights.


Locations:
-----------
• Athens
• Manchester
• More in next versions


Realistic sound effects :
---------------------------------
• ATC chatter
• Engine sound (spool up, reverse thrust, idle)
• Other sound effects
• GPWS callouts (during landing)


Cameras
----------------
• Cockpit
• Wing view

---IMPORTANT---
iPhone 6S or better recommended.
